website_summaries.verdict: A great way to get a number of nutrients and vitamins in a single pack of powder.
pros: Comes with a healthy blend of over 50 superfood concentrates such as wheatgrass, beets, berries, vegetables, and more
Powder blends well into typical beverages with a pleasant taste
cons: Powder turns into a pasty slime when sitting in water for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: I've been drinking Country Farms Super Greens for 2 months and am THRILLED with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking Country Farms Super Greens for 2 months and am THRILLED with the results. Within 20 minutes of drinking a serving you begin to feel increased stamina in your muscles. I have FSH Muscular Dystrophy. While there isn't a cure, this has been the only product I can say has given a positive result. - curbs appetite - increases muscle stamina - increases mental clarity - natural burst of energy The only problem, the Amazon photo description of the product is incorrect This product doesn't have the organic mushroom as part of the formula.
customer_reviews.author: GAMoe

customer_reviews.title: Not cool Country Farms
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: I'm guessing they no longer make this specific mix and size because the one I recieved lists only 32 "Super Foods" on the front label (missing the mushroom complex, which is half the reason I chose this one) and it is smaller in size (only containing 14 servings as opposed to 20) Huge pain in the ass to ship it back and then wait again for another product so I bit the bullet. Not cool Country Farms!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Not enough info on labels
customer_reviews.text: My husband was getting bad headache every time he drank this stuff. After calling the company he was told they use artificial sugar. He can’t have that. So disappointed it wasn’t visible on packaging. We would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: dianna Patterson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product. I add it to smoothies for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product. I add it to smoothies for myself and my kids. By why isn’t the container full? Price isn’t actually that great when you consider the container is only 50% full (and that’s being generous)! I purchased two containers as I anticipated going through it pretty fast, 2x scoops per smoothie blender. But I should have bought 4x as the containers are not full. Disappointed in packaging and false advertisement of a good price.
customer_reviews.author: AKmom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long enough to give a super detailed review on the results, but so far nothing bad to report. Im purely using this to get those extra vitamins and minerals into my diet and not for weight loss etc, so I find that mixing it into my iced coffee or chocolate milk makes it taste alot better and gives it some thickness. When I only used water, it felt like I was drinking...well.. chocolate water. All in all I have nothing bad to say about it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L

customer_reviews.title: I need my veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I don't really include veggies in my diet but I'm at that age where I really need to watch what I eat, so this is great for me! I drink it once a day. 1 scoop per 10 Oz of water and it tastes perfect! I got both chocolate and berry. The chocolate tastes like Nesquik and the berry is like a smoothie. I just got my 3rd bottle and it's been great!
customer_reviews.author: Amaborn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking this everyday since I received it 10 days ago. I bought it to help maintain my weight after a juice cleanse where I lost 5 lbs. Since I started eating solids again, my weight has steadily increased, but since I started adding this in, I did not have this for a few days after the cleanse ended, my weight has steadied and I did not gain all 5 lbs back. I think in combination with the other things I'm doing to maintain my new weight, this product has helped me with energy and feeling full. I do not crave sweets the same way I used to. I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vuong

customer_reviews.title: The one I bought from Amazon tasted excellent. I bought a second one from Walmart and ...
customer_reviews.text: The one I bought from Amazon tasted excellent. I bought a second one from Walmart and it had a strong beet taste to it. So the product doesn't seem to be consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Gretta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Displayed.
customer_reviews.text: I was rather worried at first because I saw a lot of reviews talking about not getting what the picture displayed, but what I received is exactly the same as shown in the description with the mushroom blend and the 50 Super foods. I use it in my coffee everyday and it adds a nice mocha flavor. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase. Plan to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Doan

customer_reviews.title: Too bad the formula has changed. No longer as tasty.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. Unfortunately, I am certain that the formulation has changed, along with their new packaging/branding. It doesn’t taste nearly as good as it used to. Now, once mixed with water, it has a ‘sour milk’ smell although it’s dairy-free. It’s so off-putting that I don’t think I will continue to purchase this. PLEASE go back to the old formula! It used to taste like a chocolate milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: DrK

customer_reviews.title: Product smaller with fewer good ingredients and more filler/sweetener
customer_reviews.text: Item is not as advertised, does not contain the mushroom complex listed in the description. Other ingredients also differ and contains 70 calories/serving vs 40, and 17 g of carbs/serving vs 12 g. It is also only 9.88 oz/ 14 servings instead of the advertised 10.6 oz/ 20 servings.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of Alkalizing Formula
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was fantastic! I put it in my smoothies and it tasted really good. No chalky or bad aftertaste. However, after my first two days I noticed a burning irritated rash on the back of my hands. This was the only new thing I had tried so I read up on alkalizing formula; it messes with the PH Balance in your body; which normally isn't a bad thing; so I am not saying the company is to blame; totally my body's response; however, I just wanted to make people aware that it can happen. I stopped the smoothies and my hands are better. :( I am sad because it was so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best tasting vegetable and fruit shakes ever
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. These are the best tasting vegetable and fruit shakes ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Ball

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about two weeks now, chocolate flavor is good. Not bad at all. Really need to shake it good or stir good or blend good. It’s not too sweet but a bit sweet. I’m not sure if I see a difference with this and helping my gut like other products. But it’s only been two weeks so I’ll come back and update this review after a month. Not really seeing full nutrition information but we’ll see if it helps like other super greens.
customer_reviews.author: Don671

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrible, tried it many different ways but could never get myself to choke it down
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Belina

customer_reviews.title: Appalingly designed packaging
customer_reviews.text: Feedback on this product's container packaging: there is a perforated line along the top, which, in theory, should lead to tearing off the outside seal, and not the rest of the label containing all the information. There is also a lid seal under the screw top. Basically, it took me some 20 minutes to open the container. The perforated line proved useless, and the label ended up torn to pieces (the seal is continuous with the label). Also, I had to use a knife to cut the lid seal off, as it was so firmly stuck on. This was so very frustrating, and I now have a damaged label with unclear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Beran-Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to boost my overall nutrition. Fruit and veggies are expensive and generally unripe in the area I live in. I am glad I chose the berry flavored as it has an earthy (not unpleasant) taste. I love beets and that is the first thing you taste and then the berries when drinking this product. I mix it in plain water and find it goes down easy. The amount of fruit, veggies and mushrooms that goes into this drink is amazing. It has a fresh taste, and I had no burp back or any other issues. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Wow unpleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a “green drink” in powder from. It is absolutely disgusting. Maybe they all taste like this!? my only experience has been with premade ones that weren’t that bad. I mixed it with plain water and had to throw in a little raspberry sparkling water to see if I could make it any better. No change, it truly does taste like grass and dirt. (Grass is the first ingredient so I’m not sure what I expected but it’s definitely NOT berry)
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bea

customer_reviews.title: I guess it depends on your taste buds if it is good for you or not
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this while I was doing a body cleanse to help it along. I took one sip and I cannot handle the taste personally. I gave it to a friend who is really into bodybuilding and working out and he loves it. I guess it depends on your taste buds if it is good for you or not.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Do something good for yourself!
customer_reviews.text: At first I only used this in smoothies, but the other day I just put a scoop in water and drank it. It was delicious! I usually stop drinking smoothies in the winter because it's too cold, but drinking a 10 oz glass of this mixed with water will be great. I'm even thinking of stirring it into hot tea and seeing how that works. There are a lot of fruit teas out there, so I think that will be tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: An acquired taste
customer_reviews.text: This drink is not very pleasant, in my opinion. It is sweet, you can taste the fruits, but it has a fake sugar after taste. I realized, after reading the ingredients,it has artificial sugar in it. So I have only drunk this once
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Morning protein.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best tasting stuff but it's tolerable. I mix it with my morning protein shake since I am not able to get all my fruits and veggies after bariatric surgery.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, verrry berry, and bit earthy
customer_reviews.text: The package was undamaged and sealed. I like the berry flavor, it did seem a bit sweet for me, but I also had a sweet juice added, plus I'm used to the green vegs, so it was a surprise. That said, I do enjoy it, although I do understand why one commenter said it tastes like dirt. I'm betting that's the mushroom, and I understand what he means. It is "earthy" undertoned, however, I eat beets, so earthy is doable. It is a good mix for me, I enjoy it mixed with soaked flax seed, plain yogurt and a bit of unsweetened orange juice, spin it in my Ninja, and drink 'er down. I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Weathermoon

customer_reviews.title: I wish they made a larger bottle but the stuff is a little gritty and tasteless but helpful
customer_reviews.text: I think I noticed increase in energy. I don't like pomegranate..inside but I heard it's very good. The idea of all those veggies ground up in there..makes me imagine my body -- my temple -- has all it needs for repair and energy. Seemed to work..expensive thought for average person. No certification or proof of what's in there is a bit scary. Like more proof of what factory that makes it does.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Compact & great tasting
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is just right, not too bulky to bring when traveling. I like the taste of the natural flavor, nothing synthetic tasting that usually triggers my GERD. It was recommended by a friend and I won't hesitate to recommend it to one who wants to try out supergreens. Price is reasonable as well. I've tried other brands, but this is the most satisfying so far.
customer_reviews.author: OkiSmile

customer_reviews.title: Love country farms
customer_reviews.text: Best way for me to consume green juice powders and this chocolate flavor is delicious along with the others I like, this is the only brand I can only afford that is in my budget. I only drink this once a day and every other day, I drink it with both water and my almond milk that is unsweetened, country farms is my only favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great source of super-greens, and great taste too...
customer_reviews.text: Just knowing that I'm getting the benefits from these super-greens alone is enough reason for me to keep buying this product, and the addition of a very pleasing taste makes it even better...I also add about 4 bananas and other ingredients too to build on the health benefits. My favorite liquid to take it with is vanilla flavored almond milk, and I look forward to it every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Tasty green powder, finally.
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best tasting greens powder I’ve ever purchased. It also mixes really well and has a thin smoothie texture so it’s fills you slightly. I mix with water and add bcaas for an extra kick and even more delicious flavor. I will continue to buy this. My only complaint is, I just wish it came with more than 20 servings.
customer_reviews.author: TrishPea

customer_reviews.title: I disliked the taste of this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for the taste but since I bought it, I had to finish it. It has a lot of nutrients included in it but as for the taste, I could do without. It had a berry flavor that was really artificial. Country Farms tried to make it taste good but for me, it was an "L".
customer_reviews.author: Gneius29

customer_reviews.title: Great product, although it tastes like cocoa-flavored hay
customer_reviews.text: All the superfoods listed in the description can be read on the label, so that's good. Different from other products I've seen listed here. I would definitely buy this again, despite my unfamiliarity with the taste of healthy food. ^_^ Perhaps those who are well-acquainted with the taste of these beverages will decide that they like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: DaWei LaoShi

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try. Great value for ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had but a few days but the product seems great so far. Don't like with juice but I am picky that way. Works much better for me as a smoothie with banana and frozen yogurt. I refuse to give up so I found the way that works for me. Well packaged and sealed. Quick delivery. Thankful for the berry flavor. Will write another review about results soon.
customer_reviews.author: Quan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak on the real benefits yet, only been using it for about a week now. It has a decent taste of chocolate. I blend it with my protein powder, and some other ingredients to consume after my workouts. It blends well when using a blender. I haven't tried to use it with a shaker cup or others. I like that it has good vitamins & minerals, and hopefully they aid me in my better health journey. Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Not enough for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my mom that has colon cancer and she is not able to eat solid food. The taste is great, it has a great presentation, but I think it should be a little cheaper because not everyone has enough money to buy it all the time. At least the bottle should be full for the price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: red green drink
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with almond milk and crushed ice, it is very tasty and smooth. I don't know if it has any health benefits, but it makes a tasty lunch when you're in a hurry. Add a banana.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good. Mixed it with unsweetened vanilla almond milk
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today. It’s pretty good. Mixed it with unsweetened vanilla almond milk. I despise vegetables with a passion so this is a way for me to get them. Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Anime trash

customer_reviews.title: smells like mushroom..
customer_reviews.text: I know it has mushroom in it, but I believed it would taste more like berries as it advertised. I really don't like mushroom, I can't eat it at all. And this power smells like mushroom a lot.. But my husband, who doesn't hate mushroom, says it smells and taste like berries. Do not recommended if you don't like mushroom. Overall, good product.
customer_reviews.author: sunghee chon

customer_reviews.title: Very disgusting, an expensive mistake
customer_reviews.text: It's my very first time to try such kind of product. I thought It may taste like something I made from my juicer, but I would like to say there is a world of difference. This one does not taste like fresh green juice at all. It's more like some sort of chemical component with artificial sweetener. I threw up after my first taste. I will never buy such product again. It also costs you more than fresh herbs actually.
customer_reviews.author: California Hotel

customer_reviews.title: BE WARNED, Only 14 servings in a container
customer_reviews.text: They advertise 20 servings, I just counted out, and its only 14 servings, so that makes it a lot more expensive, so go buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Great berry flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite green supplement to date. While I am no expert on nutrition, the ingredients are good and the taste is better than many others. I use this mixed with water and chia seeds to get more fiber in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, but only 12 service and not 20 as the label mentioned
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Alcantara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for someone that doesn't get many vegetables!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single bachelor who eats a lot of frozen foods. I don't have the time to cook, so I really appreciate the fact that there are products like Super Greens out there that compile all of the nutrient rich vegetables, mushrooms, fruits, etc. I believe products like these have generally improved my quality of life. Since I don't have a wife that would cook for me, I'm thankful to Country Farms for their wholesome ingredients. Much appreciative. Will continue to be a client.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because I feel it is very healthy. The taste is clean and not covered up by sugars! If you want to add this to a smoothie or juice, it will blend in nicely since it doesn't contain added sugars so then it won't be overly sweet. If you drink it just plain with water, the flavor is not masked by sugars so it can be a taste to get accustomed to but I do like it and I am getting my greens without extra sugar. The company shipped the product quickly and I am happy with the service!
customer_reviews.author: onsie_queen

customer_reviews.title: This would be better without maltodextrin, with fewer carbohydrates
customer_reviews.text: Have to quit using it on my strict Ketogenic diet. It's great but it's got a bit too much sugar, although most of it is natural. It's just that I need something with fewer grams of carbs. It's10 grams of net carbs per serving, 12 total. I had been taking it for over a year and it was great in a smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids like this as a substitute for chocolate milk. We even freeze it in popsicles. Sometimes I sweeten it with a little stevia or monk fruit.
customer_reviews.author: MForster

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Walmart used to carry this. Really good flavor. Not as earthy as most products in the market. Great way to get your greens in. Love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff ❣
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with ice and chocolate milk for a smoothie... awesome taste!!! Container was almost full, so powder did not settle much during shipping. Using this for nutrition, hence the chocolate milk! Will definitely be my superfood powder of choice❣
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I get the berry, and blend it with frozen fruit, it refreshing and filling, and has beyond your daily veg fruit. if im lazy it put in my 30 oz yeti with ice and water and shake. It get a little thick but is still good , has a slight green taste. IT good enough to blend with ice, fruit, lime and rum
customer_reviews.author: iching

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great source of
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great source of fiber and I believe everything is in it as described I’ve ordered a second one already highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carol m.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and nutrition
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I make a smoothie every morning with Super Greens, Emergen-C, blueberries, apple cider vinegar, hemp oil and Benefiber. I have tons of energy and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Auten

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I have alot of health issues and am a very fusy eater so my co worker had me try this. Im glad she did. My dr asked me what i was doing different. Told her what i was drinking. I drink it with my flavored water or flavored ice tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yuck
customer_reviews.text: it says delicious banana apple flavor, but tastes more like banana peels,yuck
customer_reviews.author: rob davidson

customer_reviews.title: Do not like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, after reading many reviews, I was hoping that the "beet" taste was exaggerated, but it was not. I've had it twice and don't think I'll get used to it. I typically can do strong greens flavoring, but this one is not it. Other than that, it was nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, right price
customer_reviews.text: Decent amount for price and taste is pretty good if you're used to this sort of thing, I think it's delicious, husband won't drink it. It's especially impressive the taste is so good knowing there's wheatgrass and spirulina in it haha he at least admits it tastes better than when I try to get him to do wheatgrass/lemon shots haha
customer_reviews.author: Fam Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Daily for health
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the banana flavor over the berry. I mix 1 scoop with water every morning and never need to worry about my daily intake of essential fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Good taste. Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good taste. Good flavor. I used it in my morning protein shakes or as a snack mixed with cold water. Price is basically the same as walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Priced well on Amazon.  Flavor is better than any I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.text: If you have tried any of the powdered "greens," they almost all taste very bad. This one is not great, but by far the best flavored one that I have tried so far. The price on Amazon is very comparable to that of other places that offer this item.
customer_reviews.author: Aw3s0m3

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It tastes bad. It is a nice quality but not the best. I've had another similar product that also had spiulina in it and I can see that this product isn't doing the same with the bowel movement
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Kinda clumpy but the taste isn't terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a great amount of time and the taste is not terrible. I'm trying to lose weight and do not get enough greens in my diet so I chose these. I'm not sure if it's help with bowel movements but I may need to give it more time.
customer_reviews.author: Trixi

customer_reviews.title: Better in a smoothie
customer_reviews.text: At first I tried this in water, and I was not pleased. It doesn't dissolve really well, and to me it tastes more like beets than berries. However, I really like the ingredients, and when I added a scoop to a blueberry smoothie it was great.
customer_reviews.author: NC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Only good thing I can say about the Berry flavor is that it does taste better than the plain but it does not dissolve as easily. Never buy the berry flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, increases energy and stamina.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of green super-foods and this is one increases my energy in a very big way. I have a 15 speed bike I ride every day and I can notice the difference when I take it out for a spin. The formula I'm taking is the Apple Banana flavor. If you like extra energy and stamina, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Aloy

customer_reviews.title: So yummy, and convenient  for  our world circumstances.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it. So, I feel less guilty about consuming many different kinds of vegetables and fruit. It come in super handy being that I bought it right near when the pandemic got started. It's definitely delicious, kids will like it.
customer_reviews.author: 30 DWF

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received the product with the lid busted open and all the contents in the box spilled everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoothie Mix
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is great, consistency is great. I use this to take the other supplements I consume.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M.

customer_reviews.title: Very powdery, makes a mess scooping it out
customer_reviews.text: Tastes alright, but when I try to scoop it out I end up making a mess. Not sure if it is because the cannister is too small for the amount of product in it, but I have used several different types of green food supplements like this and none of them have ever been this messy.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this and it arrived quickly and on time. its the first time I ever tasted anything from this company. and I have to admit. it must be an acquired taste, and I don't know if I am brave enough to try it again.
customer_reviews.author: msthamara

customer_reviews.title: Great berry flavor super food supplement
customer_reviews.text: Great super food powder, and it had a delicious berry flavor. It had a great price, it was shipped to me fast, it was a good deal, and a great value for the price. I would order this again, and maybe I'll try their other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Veggies in a canister
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I’m a firm believer in vegetables in a container, because ALL the vitamins in them. If your a mushroom lover. You’ll love this. It’s got a great taste. Actually I need to order some more. Oh, they ship it quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Patrick Pullon

customer_reviews.title: Works for me Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. As Described. Recommend. Thank You For A Pleasant Transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeymike

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this because of all the reviews. I tried adding it to a smoothie and it was horrible. I tried adding it to juice. Nope. I baked some muffins with it. I really don't think I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Apple banana >>
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this brand. First time I tried the Berry flavor. It was good till the last 5servings I lost the desired taste for it. This time I tried the banana apple and it is AMAZING. Will get this flavor again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: If you like ground up rabbit pellets, this is for you! I tried getting it to blend with water, juice and milk. It would not. Tried drinking it. Came back up. I'll stick to blending real food. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like fake sugar
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is way too sweet and leaves a terrible aftertaste. Too much stevia and almost tastes like Aspatame is in it too, although not listed on the ingredients. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BillGates

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do not write reviews, normally. I decided to try this Super Green powder instead of the one I've been using, which includes berries as well. WOW, this stuff is way too sweet! It tastes completely unnatural, I literally gagged and spit it out. I don't understand the necessity to add that much sweetener to something that is supposed to be a natural supplement. Anyhow, if I could figure out how to return it I would, I definitely do not recommend this product to anyone expecting a natural flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Chau

customer_reviews.title: Beat tasting greens supplement, mixes well, & nutritious
customer_reviews.text: It definitely has the best flavor out of all the greens supplements I have tried! Don’t expect it to be sweet, but it’s a nice smooth and mellow flavor. It mixes well and is definitely drinkable on its own, but I’m sure it would be delicious mixed in a smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Calyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I mixed the super greens powder in water. Taste slightly sweet and thickens water a little bit. No bad after taste. Taste much better than I thought it would. In a smoothie it should be really good. Really enjoyed this drink.
customer_reviews.author: royalty

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled about the flavor but I drink it because I bought it. I don’t feel any difference so I am not sure what it is doing. Not sure if I will buy this product again because I don’t see any benefits.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Try it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff because it gives me a boost and makes me feel good. It's flavor tastes like berries mixed with beets but I don't mind beets. I use this product twice a day and it works for me. Take it to work and add yo a bottle of water for that extra boost.
customer_reviews.author: E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Yunmy Chocolate. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a very picky eater for an adult and I don’t usually meet the daily required fruit and vegetables serving so I decided to try this. I was not expecting at all but this tastes good! I love the chocolate flavor. Mix it with half water and half milk, in a glass, put a cling wrap on top and shake it (no mess, no need for a blender) I’m so pleased I bought it too for my sister who is a frontliner. Boost your immunity y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This taste really good. It blends very well in my morning smoothie. I throw in with about half a banana(as the powder it self is already sweet for my taste) and sometimes a few bunches of spinach. Yum.I would recommend. I haven't noticed any noticeable physical changes so I won't give 5 stars but it taste good. Be warned also that the container is quite large for the amount in there. Don't know why all that extra packaging a bit deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: anointed

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Kept me full. Boosted energy. Easy to take to work and make! Or even for a breakfast shake.
customer_reviews.author: CDost

customer_reviews.title: delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to vanilla almond milk every morning as an extra boost of vitimins and to boost my energy and immune system. Its delicious and I feel great after drinking it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best greens product I've ever tried, the taste is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for months and I will continue to buy the chocolate kind. I put it in my coffee every morning and the taste is so good! Plus I'm getting my healthy greens, win win!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Pullins

customer_reviews.title: contents are not packed full
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing these for a while and the last package I received was only about 3/4 of the way full. Was told that settlement will occur but that is too much.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Good clean nutrition but the wheat grass flavor is more powerful than the berry flavor. I would recommend using it in a smoothie with frozen berries.
customer_reviews.author: Journey to the Skinnydom

customer_reviews.title: Love the Flavor and Price
customer_reviews.text: These are a great find. I have tried other greens drinks and they tasted horrible. However, this greens drink is the opposite. The flavor tastes like berries and they offer 50 organic super foods. It's a pretty good price also, for the amount of servings (20) and they provide tons of antioxidants. I have been buying these for a couple months now, and until I find something better, I am sticking with these :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  Liermann

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love these greens! I mix them with a little water or milk and they’re pretty good. A great way for me to get my veggies everyday. Will keep drinking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Earth taste
customer_reviews.text: This taste just like earth literally if you’re not already eating healthy and your taste buds have changed don’t try this yet I was not advanced enough to handle this nasty earthly taste yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grate taste and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, this supplement works with weight loss, I look lighter already in just one week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily, tastes great! Good way to get nutrients into a son that is a picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kriewald

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Like most of these products its hard to disguise the taste of the product. Wasn't entirely bad, the flavor just wasn't strong enough for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Brice E McCain

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent source of nutrition, and they taste good too! I started taking these after I bought the Super Reds at Walmart. I had so much energy after taking those, that the greens were a must have. I feel great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken DePastino

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s a great way to get your nutrients in every day regardless of whether you get your daily veggie intake. I like salads and I’ve been successful in getting other people that hates healthy stuff to try and love this supergreens powder. It tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Machete

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor I add mine in diet cranberry juice. It mixes well. I just didn't like that they don't give much in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Silva

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at a couple different products before I decided on this one. This was one of the cheaper products that I found. This was the closest to chocolate milk I have ever had with a powdered drink!! It was sooo good! I drink this every morning and will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, mixes real good in Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, mixes real good in Shaker, definitely notice a difference after a couple of days, wish it came in at least a 30 day supply
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quantity/Volume/Servings Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely torn while writing this review. Although I really do like the product in terms of ingredients, mixability, and flavor, it is advertised as having 20 servings; which it does not. Using the included scoop, I am on serving #9 and there are only around 6 scoops left in the container. This represents a 25% discrepancy. Keep in mind, these are level scoops, not heaping. So, while I do like the product, the servings are advertised incorrectly, the included scoop is larger than intended, or maybe I just got a fluke batch. Maybe you will be luckier than I did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff! I get my nutrition and greens and I actually look forward to drinking them. When I have a cheat meal I can make up for it now my treating myself to a delicious and very filling chocolate shake that’s healthy! This is a no brainer and I glow ! I’ve turned so many on to this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Fabwife

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting blend of Whole Foods and probiotics. I use it in my smoothies and find it to be a delicious flavor I can mix with a number of variations. I would like the serving size to be for a 30 day supply and not 20 as one scoop a day is perfect, that is the only thing to me that would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Rene' Bannigan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Such a amazing boost of energy. Not to bad of a taste with juice. Make my body feel so much healthier
customer_reviews.author: sabrina banning

product_meta.title: Country Farms Super Green Drink, Berry Flavor, 10.6 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor:BerryThe Country Farms Super Greens berry flavor drink mix is an organic, nutrient-packed powerhouse supplement which provides an alkalizing, low-calorie blend of fruits, vegetables, grasses, berries, mushrooms, probiotics, other greens and much more. Boasting a whopping 50 Total, farm-fresh ingredients which support optimal health, This super greens drink may also help with proper digestion, boosted energy levels and immune health, and hunger satisfaction. This comes with 20 servings. Since 1972, Country Farms has served as a trusted source of wholesome, nutrient-dense supplements for health-minded individuals. Their mission has always been to create premium, clean formulas designed to provide balance for Central nutrition, health and vitality while supporting overall well-being with convenient, easy-to-use supplements. They strive to inspire quality, natural health choices, which shows in their products that burst with benefits like vitamins, minerals, protein, antioxidants, omegas, fiber, and digestive enzymes. These supplements offer health-conscious convenience without sacrifice and are prepared with integrity to restore your daily nutritional levels. This is the pure, fresh-from-the-garden promise of nature's finest from Country Farms.
feature_bullets: STRAIGHT FROM THE GARDEN – Don’t be a statistic! The CDC tells us that only 1 in 10 Americans eat enough fruits and veggies. Fortunately, Country Farms Super Greens Berry Flavor combines the health-building nutrition of USDA Organic fresh fruits, veggies, grasses, berries, algae, mushrooms and superfoods in the convenience of a powdered drink mix.

BOOST ENERGY, IMMUNE HEALTH & VITALITY – Thanks to the 50 USDA Organic whole food ingredients in each serving of Super Greens Berry flavor drink mix, you can find the vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and enzymes necessary to support overall wellness. It provides an alkalizing whole food blend of fruits, vegetables, probiotics, greens and reds that are vital for your health.

AMERICA’S CHOICE – Enjoy America’s #1 superfood drink mix to start your morning to the fullest or as a healthy snack in between meals. Whenever you use Super Greens, you’ll be fortifying your diet with a premium USDA Organic, gluten free, non-GMO, natural whole food supplement to help support ultimate nutrition.

SUPERFOOD NUTRITION WITHOUT THE HASSLE OF JUICING – Enjoy delicious Berry flavored Country Farms Super Greens alone as a tasty shake or blend it with your favorite smoothie. This convenient drink mix offers the power of farm-to-table nutrition without the cleanup or hassles of juicing!

PROBIOTICS, PREBIOTICS, GREENS, GRASSES & MORE – With Country Farms Super Greens, you will get 20 servings in a 10.6-ounce bottle, packed with 50 USDA Organic superfoods, probiotics, prebiotics, greens and grasses, plus 4 grams of fiber per serving!

MANUFACTURER PROMISE: When buying, please check whether the product is "Ships from and sold by Amazon" to make sure you are receiving this product from the manufacturer to ensure proper product dating.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
